eu_initiatives: TPCA follows works of the EU Joint Transfer Pricing Forum (JTPF) that assists and advises the European Commission on transfer pricing tax matters.
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
relevant_communication: TPCA acts by the way of written contributions to legislative initiatives. TPCA promotes transfer pricing knowledge.We provide information on transfer pricing to an open auditorium through our web site (www.cct.org.pl and English site www.tpca.eu) as well as the social media. We organise transfer pricing conferences dedicated to advanced topics that are currently developed on the OECD or EU arena.
goals__remit:
“Transfer Pricing Centre” Association is a non-profit organization aimed at promoting transfer pricing knowledge in Poland, founded by specialists working for capital groups in Poland, mainly in energy and industry sector. 
Association devoted to promoting transfer pricing knowledge in Poland. Responsible for participation in legislative process in Poland and taking part in public consultations at the OECD WP6. The association is the first and only independent organisation in Poland of in-house transfer pricing business professionals, focusing on needs and expectations of businesses and covering a broad range of taxation issues arising in capital groups.
